data.title: Christ Church Academy - Excellence in Education in Stone
data.text:
Excellence in Education

Christ Church Academy is a very special place and we are delighted to welcome you to our website.

We are a very happy Academy where children excel, achieve and enjoy; make their own positive contribution. An Academy where their health, safety and wellbeing is understood and promoted. We aim to create a community in which every child matters and thrives. We provide each child with the opportunity for growth - personal, emotional, spiritual and intellectual. We aim to ensure that every child fulfils their potential and has the opportunity to flourish.

The individual is very much valued and we encourage independent thought and learning as the child moves through the four years of our Academy leaving as happy and confident young adults.

Mr C M Wright Mrs T Thorn

Executive Principal Head of School

Our Vision is:
